Hello World!

Welcome to my blog! This is my first post using 11ty and Tailwind CSS. I'm excited to share my thoughts and experiences with you.

Why 11ty?

11ty (Eleventy) is a simpler static site generator that transforms data files into HTML. It's incredibly fast and flexible, making it perfect for blogs and documentation sites.

Why Tailwind CSS?

Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that allows me to build custom designs without leaving my HTML. It's perfect for rapid development and maintaining consistency across my site.

What's Next?

I'll be sharing:

  • Web development tips and tricks
  • Project walkthroughs
  • Thoughts on the latest web technologies
  • And much more!

Stay tuned for more content coming soon!
